text: Pavel Eljanov (born 1983) is a Ukrainian chess grandmaster. Eljanov's most notable tournament result to date was winning Corus B tournament 2007 in Wijk aan Zee, Holland with a score of 9/13. This result enabled him to qualify for the category 20 tournament Corus A 2008. On the September 2010 FIDE rating list, Eljanov had a rating of 2761, making him number 1 in Ukraine and number 6 in the world. His results in the Russian premier league had been exceptional. Since then he has slipped to #21. Category:Ukrainian chess players Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters
title: Pavel Eljanov
